source.name: Recycling Dropoff Sites - Shapefile
source.description: Locations in Chicago where residents can drop off recycling. For more about Recycling in Chicago, visit http://bit.ly/IcfLHr. To view or use these files, compression software and special GIS software, such as ESRI ArcGIS, is required.
